Macros.h File Reference

#include <malloc.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include "Status.h"

Defines

#define SAFE_OPERATION(operation)   do {operation;} while (0)
#define ROUND(val)   (long)((val) + 0.5)
#define VALIDATE(condition, error)   SAFE_OPERATION(if (!(condition)) return (error))
#define VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(condition)   VALIDATE(condition, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT)
#define CLEAR(var)   SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(*var)))
#define CLEAR_ARRAY(var, size)   SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(var[0]) * ARRAY_SIZE(size)))
#define NEW(type)   (type*)(malloc(sizeof(type)))
#define NEW_ARRAY(type, size)   (type*)(malloc(ARRAY_BYTE_SIZE(type, size)))
#define DELETE(ptr)   SAFE_OPERATION(free(ptr); ptr = NULL)
#define CHECK(rc)   SAFE_OPERATION(if ((s_lastStatus = rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (s_lastStatus))
#define NCHECK(rc)   SAFE_OPERATION(if ((rc) == eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (eSTATUS_COMMON_OK))
#define CHECK_STATUS_BREAK(rc)   {if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) break;}
#define GET_MEMBER(destination, ptr, member)   SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr && destination); *destination = ptr->member; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)
#define SET_MEMBER(source, ptr, member)   SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr); ptr->member = source; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)
#define CONSTRUCT(pptr, module,...)
#define DESTRUCT(pptr, module)

Define Documentation

#define CHECK ( rc   )     SAFE_OPERATION(if ((s_lastStatus = rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (s_lastStatus))

Checks return code and exits function if not successfull

Parameters:
rc return code to be checked

#define CHECK_STATUS_BREAK ( rc   )     {if ((rc) != eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) break;}

Checks return code and breaks a loop if not successfull

Parameters:
rc return code to be checked

#define CLEAR ( var   )     SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(*var)))

Zeroes a struct according to its size

Parameters:
var variable to be cleared
See also:
CLEAR_ARRAY, NEW, DELETE

#define CLEAR_ARRAY ( var,
size   )     SAFE_OPERATION(memset(var, 0, sizeof(var[0]) * ARRAY_SIZE(size)))

Zeroes an array

Parameters:
var pointer to array to be cleared
size items count
See also:
CLEAR, NEW_ARRAY, DELETE

#define CONSTRUCT ( pptr,
module,
...   ) 

Value:

SAFE_OPERATION ( \
                                                                                                        VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr); \
                                                                                                        *pptr = NEW(module); \
                                                                                                        VALIDATE(*pptr, eSTATUS_COMMON_NO_MEMORY); \
                                                                                                        return module ## Init (*pptr, ## __VA_ARGS__); \
                                                                                                )
Allocates and initializes a structure, validating a pointer
Parameters:
pptr *pptr will be initialized with allocated structure
module data type to be allocated
... additional parameters, provided to initializer
See also:
NEW

#define DELETE ( ptr   )     SAFE_OPERATION(free(ptr); ptr = NULL)

Frees previousely allocated variable

Parameters:
ptr pointer to allocated variable
See also:
NEW, NEW_ARRAY, DESTRUCT

#define DESTRUCT ( pptr,
module   ) 

Value:

SAFE_OPERATION( \
                                                                                                        VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(pptr && *pptr); \
                                                                                                        CHECK(module ## Destroy(*pptr)); \
                                                                                                        DELETE(*pptr); \
                                                                                                        return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK; \
                                                                                                )
Destroys and deallocates a structure
Parameters:
pptr *pptr must point to valid structure
module module name

#define GET_MEMBER ( destination,
ptr,
member   )     SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr && destination); *destination = ptr->member; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)

Retrieves structure member value, previously validating the pointers

Parameters:
destination pointer to destination
ptr pointer to structure
member member name to be retrieved
See also:
SET_MEMBER

#define NCHECK ( rc   )     SAFE_OPERATION(if ((rc) == eSTATUS_COMMON_OK) return (eSTATUS_COMMON_OK))

Checks return code and exits function if successfull

Parameters:
rc return code to be checked

#define NEW ( type   )     (type*)(malloc(sizeof(type)))

Allocates a memory for a type according to its size

Parameters:
type data type to be allocated
See also:
NEW_ARRAY, DELETE, CLEAR

#define NEW_ARRAY ( type,
size   )     (type*)(malloc(ARRAY_BYTE_SIZE(type, size)))

Allocates an array

Parameters:

size items count
See also:

#define ROUND ( val   )     (long)((val) + 0.5)

Converts double value into rounded long

Parameters:
val double value

#define SAFE_OPERATION ( operation   )     do {operation;} while (0)

Used in other macros in order to allow usage of macros inside if/else block

Parameters:
operation Code block

#define SET_MEMBER ( source,
ptr,
member   )     SAFE_OPERATION(VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS(ptr); ptr->member = source; return eSTATUS_COMMON_OK;)

Sets structure member, previously validating a pointer

Parameters:
source source value
ptr pointer to structure
member member name to be set

#define VALIDATE ( condition,
error   )     SAFE_OPERATION(if (!(condition)) return (error))

Checks a condition and returns an error if a condition not satisfied

Parameters:
condition boolean expression
error error code to be returned

#define VALIDATE_ARGUMENTS ( condition   )     VALIDATE(condition, eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT)

Checks a condition and returns eSTATUS_COMMON_INVALID_ARGUMENT if a condition not satisfied

Parameters:
condition boolean expression
